silwa mathithuma. 11 – 11.30 sambudu pujawa pothuwila dhammarathana himi, paswaru 12.30 – 1 maranayata kapa wu gawayin nidahas kirima ha rodaputu kruthrima pada pirinamima. 1 – 2 damsak pawathum suthraya, kalubowitiyana gunananda himi, 2 – 3 dharma deshanawa, uyanwaththe nyanaloka na himi, 3.30 – 4.30 dharma deshanawa wathuragama nandasiri himi, 4.30 – 5.30 keti anushasanawa saha sath budu pujawa ha sil pawaranaya, migarahawaththe panynyasiri himi.
